title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8187-2.6 - Adjournments
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8187-2.6 - Adjournments

State Regulations

Notwithstanding the provisions of section
8187-1.4
of this Part, no adjournment may be granted later than 10 days prior to the
scheduled or rescheduled hearing date, except upon written consent of all
complainants and respondents. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§§
8187-2.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
